title: Automate Azure Cloud Account Onboarding
description: Onboarding an Azure account, such as Azure Tenant, Azure Subscription, or Azure Active Directory on Prisma Cloud connects all your Azure resources to Prisma Cloud including Accounts with Management Groups, Subscriptions, and Active Directory. Prisma Cloud uses Application (Client) ID, Application Client Secret and Enterprise Application Object ID for authentication to ingest Azure Active Directory metadata, configurations, and logs.
